tool_description: Rylor is an AI Writer Tool that Assists You With The Help of Artificial Intelligence, in Creating Content, such as Articles, Cold Mails, Product Descriptions, Letters, etc.
name: Rylor
title: Rylor

api_list.name: Query / Prompt
api_list.description: This will return the response for the prompt/query
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rylor.p.rapidapi.com/what%20is%20ai%20in%20detail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rylor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rylor.p.rapidapi.com/{prompt}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rylor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
